'''''"Sappho Amidst the Waves"''''' is an [[achievement]] set in the category ''[[Duelist: Series I]]''. The achievements are earned by defeating the [[Local Legend]] Sappho Amidst the Waves while completing challenge conditions.

==Notes==

==Trivia==
* Upon nearing Sappho Amidst the Waves, the soundtrack is replaced with a simple tune played on a stringed instrument. As the player approaches, she is seen sitting on the ground, playing the tune. She will not become [[Aggravation|aggravated]] unless the player attacks her or the animals, or captures one of the animals with the [[Omni-Ubiquity Net]].
